title: Through the Shadow, Rebel Wisdom
description:
What is the shadow? How can we integrate it? Carl Jung defined the shadow as any part of ourselves we repress or deny.

This film was made by Lorcan McSharp, using clips from various Rebel Wisdom films. lorcan's YouTube channel is here: https://www.youtube.com/user/lorkzilla 

The animation and music is from Lubomir Arsov's 'In Shadow, a Modern Odyssey': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j800SVeiS5I&t=236s

A Zen Master talks about Jordan Peterson and the Shadow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ABWeA203Q-c&t=1s

In Shadow: Where Artists Fear to Tread: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0WHPGHBBXMc

Mysticism, Spirit and the Shadow, Jordan Peterson: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zAsR6DZTvS8&t=926s

'Apocalypse Now?' with Jordan Greenhall and Akira the Don: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EL_S0p9UVcM&t=9s
